caption.center: Eric JONES v. STATE of Mississippi.

opinion.posture: Appeal from Circuit Court, Coahoma County; Elzy J. Smith, J.
opinion.attorneys:
Tom T. Ross, Jr., Ross Ross, Clarksdale, for appellant.
Edwin Lloyd Pittman, Atty. Gen. by Deirdre McCrory, Sp. Asst. Atty. Gen., Jackson, for appellee.
opinion.panel: Before HAWKINS, P.J., and ROBERTSON and ANDERSON, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
WALKER, C.J., ROY NOBLE LEE, P.J., and DAN M. LEE and GRIFFIN, JJ., concur.
PRATHER and SULLIVAN, JJ., not participating.
